name: Plaguepunk Justice
description:
This world has been dominated by the Plague for many generations. Nobody remembers what it was like before the outbreak. Yet the humanity has adapted to the world of eternal disease. To zombies. To masks. To plague doctors.

Being a plague doctor is a dangerous job, but someone has to do it.

Plaguepunk Justice is a tactical turn-based strategy game about being a healer in a world of plague.

Key features:
  • Randomized game levels
  • Medicinal alchemy
  • Tactical turn-based healing
